name: agentron-studio
description: Enterprise-ready local AI agent orchestration and workflow automation

scripts.release:prepare: npm run release:bump -- patch && npm test && npm run build:ui && npm run build:docs
scripts.check: node scripts/run-workspace.mjs all typecheck && node scripts/run-workspace.mjs packages/ui lint && node scripts/run-workspace.mjs packages/ui test:coverage
scripts.pre-push: npm run check && npm run build:ui && npm run build:docs && node scripts/run-workspace.mjs apps/desktop dist
scripts.build:desktop: npm run build:ui && node scripts/run-workspace.mjs apps/desktop build
scripts.start:desktop: node scripts/run-workspace.mjs apps/desktop build && npx electron apps/desktop
scripts.dist:desktop: npm run build:desktop && node scripts/run-workspace.mjs apps/desktop dist
